title: 9mm HD v1.0.1 Final By bobiras2009

Overview: The gangs want you dead. They donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know what theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re in for.

Now you can play 9mm for Android and become John "Loose" Kannon, the leader of a special team of hardened cops that aren't afraid to bend the law to clean up the streets. 


But when they kill a local drug lord's brother and steal millions in cash, the theft makes Kannon's whole team the target of every gangster in the city. Now Kannon has only one option: Take down the gang leader that's hunting them, legally or not, before his team gets taken out first.

HIGH CALIBER ACTION
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dive headlong into this stylish third-person shooter game where youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll jump and fire clip after clip from your guns in stunning slow motion stunts to take out rooms full of criminals.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The action simulation really comes to life as destructible 3D environments splinter and explode.

ALL IN A DAYÃ¢â‚¬â„¢S WORK

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Set out to fight crime and corruption in varied locations like the Latino Suburbs, Night Club, Police Department, Rich Suburbs, Industrial Area and Mexico.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Catch gang leaders and informants alive, chasing them through city streets and taking them aside for a not-so-friendly chat in the interrogation challenge.
